snippet: Peyton Manning earned back half of the $4 million pay cut he accepted last winter by leading the Denver Broncos back to the Super Bowl....
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning earned back half of the $4 million pay cut he accepted last winter by leading the Denver Broncos back to the Super Bowl.

headline.main: Win Over Patriots Was Worth $2 Million to Manning
headline.print_headline: Win Over Patriots Was Worth $2 Million to Manning
